name: ngx-datetime-picker
description: Date, DateTime & Time Picker components that uses native HTML5 components on mobile

scripts.demo: npm run dist && cd dist && npm pack && cd .. && cd demo && npm install && npm remove ngx-datetimepicker && npm install ../dist/ngx-datetime-picker-2.0.0.tgz && ng serve
scripts.demo.build: npm run dist && cd demo && npm remove ngx-datetimepicker && npm install ../ && ng build

author: Josh Sommer <joshdsommer@gmail.com> (https://twitter.com/_JoshSommer)
